head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths ZELMAN, MARTHA K.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths ZELMAN, MARTHA K.

block.p: ZELMAN-Martha K., Honorable. Beloved wife of Norman. Devoted mother of Bonita and Steven, Harriette and John, Richard and Joan. Dear sister Sara and the late Roberta and Frances. Adored grandmother of Kaitlin, Jonathan, Gillian, Lauren, Erica and Jared. Services Wednesday, 1 PM, at Temple Judea, 333 Searingtown Road, Manhasset.

ZELMAN-Martha K., Honorable. Beloved wife of Norman. Devoted mother of Bonita and Steven, Harriette and John, Richard and Joan. Dear sister Sara and the late Roberta and Frances. Adored grandmother of Kaitlin, Jonathan, Gillian, Lauren, Erica and Jared. Services Wednesday, 1 PM, at Temple Judea, 333 Searingtown Road, Manhasset.
